title: Hotel Rwanda (2004) PAL DVD9
description:
Hotel Rwanda (2004)
-------------------
"When a country descended into madness and the world turned its back, one man had to make a choice."

IMDB: <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0395169/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0395169/</a>

Audio: English (DS 2.1, DD 5.1)

Subs: Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish

Extra Materials:
- Audio Commentary by Director Terry George and Paul Rusesabagina, With Select Commentary by Wyclef Jean.
- Selected Scenes Commentary by Don Cheadle.
- A Message for Peace: Making Hotel Rwanda.
- Global View 2004.
- Global View 2005.
- Theatrical Trailer.



Plot outline:
Ten years ago some of the worst atrocities in the history of mankind took place in the country of Rwanda--and in an era of high-speed communication and round the clock news, the events went almost unnoticed by the rest of the world. In only three months, one million people were brutally murdered. In the face of these unspeakable actions, inspired by his love for his family, an ordinary man summons extraordinary courage to save the lives of over a thousand helpless refugees, by granting them shelter in the hotel he manages.
